name: Deepnight
headline: Building The Next Generation of Night Vision Devices
description: DeepNight is building the next generation of night vision with AI.

founders.description: Getting rid of image intensifier tubes.

# 
Open the dark
### SHARPER SCIENCE
## Nextgen night vision
Deepnight combines emerging science in AI imaging with low-light sensors, turning pitch black to vivid color and broadening nighttime sight into a full field of vision. We’re building a world where people and their potential are no longer limited by darkness. [Learn more about our mission and approach](https://www.deepnight.ai/<https:/deepnight.ai/about/>).
### mLUX TEST
## A clear difference
Lux is a unit of measurement used to describe light intensity and illuminance.
1951 USAF Resolution Chart
## BENEFITS
  * ### 01 Versatility
  * ### 02 Motion Tech
  * ### 03 Adaptation
  * ### 04 Potential


![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/1farm.jpg)
Stay versatile. Whether it's aiding nighttime navigation in autonomous vehicles, enhancing surveillance for wildlife research, or improving agricultural monitoring after dark, Deepnight technology adapts to a wide range of applications.
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/3animals.jpg)
Our algorithms compensate automatically for any movement, providing you with steady, uninterrupted visibility across every condition and type of terrain. 
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/car.png)
Deepnight's real-time processing adapts to your environment. AI algorithms adapt to varying environmental conditions instantly, ensuring consistent performance in urban light pollution or the natural darkness of remote areas.
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/5fire.jpg)
From environmental management and detection, to nighttime agriculture efficiency, to empowering safety in low-light environments in defense—the infrastructural possibilities with Deepnight can help reshape industries. 
###  BACKERS / PARTNERS 
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/y-combinator1.png)
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/anduril.png)
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/idkY8eChgG_logos_1.png)
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/sionyx.png)
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/sri.png)
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/devcom.png)
![](https://deepnight.ai/wp-content/themes/Deepnight/images/logos/wordmark-logo.webp)
Deepnight © 2024

generated_description:
**Deepnight: Illuminating the Future with Night Vision Technology**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Deepnight is on a mission to change the way we see in the dark. As part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, this innovative startup is dedicated to developing the next generation of night vision devices powered by artificial intelligence. With a lean team of 8 employees, they’re tackling the challenge of transforming pitch-black environments into vibrant, usable spaces.

The essence of Deepnight's technology lies in combining advanced AI imaging with low-light sensors. Their goal? To create a world where darkness is no longer a barrier to potential. They envision applications ranging from automated nighttime navigation in vehicles to enhanced wildlife surveillance and even improved agricultural monitoring after sundown.

Here’s what makes Deepnight stand out:

1. **Versatility**: Their technology adapts to various applications, proving beneficial in fields as diverse as agriculture and defense.
   
2. **Motion Tech**: Their algorithms are designed to provide steady visibility, automatically compensating for movement and ensuring high-quality imaging across different terrains.

3. **Real-time Adaptation**: The AI algorithms dynamically respond to environmental changes, maintaining consistent performance whether in urban settings littered with light pollution or in remote dark areas.

4. **Broad Potential**: From enhancing safety to improving environmental monitoring, Deepnight’s applications hold the promise of reshaping entire industries.

Their vision is ambitious, but it’s backed by solid partnerships and the credibility of Y Combinator. Key partners include reputable names like Anduril and SiOnyx, which strengthens Deepnight's position in this competitive space.

In a world that often retreats into darkness, Deepnight is boldly stepping forward, aiming to illuminate our nights—quite literally. Whether you’re navigating through the forests, managing crops after dark, or monitoring wildlife, they’re committed to ensuring that the potential of people will no longer be hampered by the absence of light.

You can learn more about their groundbreaking work at [Deepnight.ai](https://www.deepnight.ai). 

So, as they say, “Open the dark” and see what Deepnight can do for you.
